33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir, that the Prophet(s.a.w) said:"There is no soul born upon the earth – meaning today – upon whom will come one hundred years." (Sahih)

chapter.eng-name: 'A Hundred Years Shall Not Pass While A Soul Born Upon The Earth Today Survives'
